name: Bearded Chicken Schlinger
description:
Bearded man is fed up with the over-commercialization of Mr. Chicken. He's had enough of it and coming from a long line of schlingers he's going where no bearded schlinger has gone before. He's going out on his own into the wilderness. He's destined to survive by his own means. He will schling until there is nothing left. He is the bearded chicken schlinger.

Programming & Sound: Corey Kruger, Caige Nichols
Art: Tiffany Collins

Controls:
Press "A" and "D" to move the bearded schlinger left and right and user your mouse to aim. The longer you hold down your mouse button the more powerful the schling!
